actions.name: Execute Python Script
actions.title: Fetch the Start time for Schedule

properties.display_name: Fetch the Start time for Schedule
properties.script:
import time
from datetime import datetime

currentTime_timestamp = time.time()
currentTime = datetime.fromtimestamp(currentTime_timestamp    ).strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")

nextTime = currentTime_timestamp + 60

print (str(datetime.fromtimestamp(nextTime).strftime("%H:%M")))
